thoughts.text: I think I will start by checking the current working directory to see what files and directories are present. This will give me an idea of what resources I have available to work with.
thoughts.reasoning: Checking the current working directory will give me an idea of what resources I have available to work with, which will help me determine which command to use next.
thoughts.plan:
- Run the 'list_files' command to list the files and directories in the current working directory
- Review the list to determine what resources are available
thoughts.criticism: I should have checked the current working directory earlier, as it would have given me a better idea of what resources I had available.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to list the files and directories in the current working directory and review the list to determine what resources are available.
